verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Love lifted me! newline Love lifted me! newline When nothing else could help, newline Love lifted me. newline Love lifted me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I was sinking deep in sin, newline Far from the peaceful shore, newline Very deeply stained within, newline Sinking to rise no more. newline But the Master of the sea newline Heard my despairing cry, newline From the waters lifted me; newline Now safe am I.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All my heart to Him I give; newline Ever to Him I'll cling, newline In His blessed presence live, newline Ever His praises sing. newline Love so mighty and so true newline Merits my soul's best songs; newline Faithful, loving service, too, newline To Him belongs.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Souls in danger, look above; newline Jesus completely saves. newline He will lift you by His love newline Out of the angry waves. newline He's the Master of the sea, newline Billows His will obey. newline He your Savior wants to be, newline Be saved today.
